projectDetail.title: QBS Solutions Platform
projectDetail.description1: QBS Solutions is an open-source platform for non-profit organizations. It helps automate financial reporting and enhance public oversight.
tasks: Creation of an MVP with core features
Publishing open source code on GitHub
projectDetail.description2: As of now, the platform has been tested by over 20 organizations. Users appreciate its intuitive interface and usability.
